channel.title: Pleasew help! any1
channel.description:
im in school now and rly need the answer to this
Jackie claims that there are identity properties for addition, subtraction, and multiplication. Which of the following statements is correct?
Her assertion is false because subtraction does not have an identity property. Her assertion is correct because all three operations have an identity property. Her assertion is false because multiplication does not have an identity property. Her assertion is false because addition does not have an identity property.
under is the answers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2009, 12:23:17 pm[/size][hr]im in algebra support so i dont have muhc time on comp...
